question: Who has been appointed as the CEO of Freecharge Payment Technologies Private Ltd, by Axis Bank?
explanation: Axis Bank has completed the acquisition of Freecharge for a cash consideration of 373.27 crore. It has also announced appointment of Sangram Singh as the CEO of Freecharge Payment Technologies Private Ltd. Management of Axis Bank believes that this acquisition will double its customer base and will fast track its digital journey by multiple years.
